name: Creme Brulee Rice Pudding
author: Rice Select
summary: Creme brulee meets rice pudding for a dessert combining the best of both worlds.
ingredients: 1 ¼ cups cooked RiceSelect® Jasmati® Rice
directions: In saucepan, combine milk and whipping cream
Cut vanilla bean lengthwise and scrape vanilla bean seeds into saucepan; add vanilla beans and salt
In bowl, whisk together eggs, egg yolks, cinnamon, rice, and 1/2 cup sugar
Remove vanilla beans from cream mixture
Slowly pour hot cream mixture in a thin stream into the egg/rice mixture, whisking constantly
Pour or ladle into prepared ramekins; place ramekins on a large baking sheet and place on oven rack; carefully pour enough hot water to reach halfway up the sides of the ramekins
Bake until edges are set and centers are still slightly jiggly when shaken, approximately 25 minutes
Remove ramekins from water bath and place on rack to cool for at least 10 minutes
When ready to serve, remove from refrigerator and sprinkle remaining sugar evenly over tops
Broil 5-6 inches from heat until sugar evenly melts and becomes a caramel color
Remove from oven and serve immediately
(Sugar may also be browned using a professional culinary torch
